SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.deck

Class VisibleCardsList<CardType extends Card>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.deck.VisibleCardsList<CardType>
Type Parameters:
CardType - type of the visible cards' list
public class VisibleCardsList<CardType extends Card> extends Observable
The class represents a list of visible cards on the game table. Every VisibleCardsList will have maximum 2 cards.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • VisibleCardsList

      public VisibleCardsList(Deck<CardType> deck, List<Observer> observers, AtomicInteger lastEventId)

      observers - list of observers
      lastEventId - integer used to uniquely identify events

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public Optional<CardType> draw(PlayerToken playerToken, int listIndex, int handIndex)
      Allows players to draw from the visible cards list. Replaces the drawn card with a card drawn from the deck. If the deck is empty, it replaces the card with null.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token of the player drawing the card
      listIndex - the list index of the element to be removed
      handIndex - index in the player's hand where card will be placed
      Returns:
      Optional.empty() if listIndex out of bound or no card was in specified position, Optional.of(drawn card) otherwise

    • getCards

      public List<CardType> getCards()
      cards' getter, allows to have cards as private.
      Returns:
      list of cards in the list

    • get

      public CardType get(int index)
      Allows to get the card in the list at a certain index.
      Parameters:
      index - index in the list of the card of interest
      Returns:
      the card at the index in the list
